column5: I went out to do some shore fishing on the Grand and managed two smallies on a mepps spinner.  Heres one of the smallies i caught. I taken a pic of the other one but having trouble uploading it.

nice fish!... I fish along victoria st.. last yr I did very well... there are some really good size in the grand.. keep posting man.... used photobucket for uploading ur pic... just copy IMG paste it here... works well...
i caught that around newport bridge. Yea i used photobucket but the one pic wouldn't load correctly. Thanks
